name: About:blank - Foxkeh Side
description:
Foxkeh side view - blue background.  Other style can be found here: style 2400

NOTE:  I cannot upload the URI scheme because it over-exceeds the character limit.

To make it into a URI scheme for advanced users: 

-Open up Stylish and manage styles.
-Click edit "About:blank - Foxkeh Side"
-Copy the image url and view it on Firefox.
-Once it's completely loaded, right-click and Save Image.
-Delete the url in the and within the quote marks, click 'Insert', then click 'Data URI'.
-Find the image and convert it as a data URI.
-Save changes.

Foxkeh is (c) by www.foxkeh.com
